question: Complete the sentence. When considering agile development, Architecture to Support Project will identify what products the Enterprise needs, the boundary of the products, and what constraints a product owner has; this defines the Enterpriseâ€™s ______________.
options: operations
lifecycle economics
backlog
workflow management

question: Who is responsible for the oversight of structures and mechanisms that drive enterprise governance of information and technology (EGIT)?
options: Individual business units
External regulators
The board

question: COBIT defines stakeholder value creation as which of the following?
options: Realization of benefits at a controlled resource cost while controlling risk
Realization of benefits at an optimal resource cost while optimizing risk
Realization of benefits at a reduced resource cost while mitigating risk

question: The value that I&T delivers should be:
options: aligned directly with the values on which the business is focused.
focused exclusively on I&T investments that generate financial benefits.
restricted to maintaining and increasing value derived from existing I&T investments.

question: COBIT addresses governance issues by doing which of the following?
options: Grouping relevant governance components into objectives that can be managed to a required capability level
Providing a full description of the entire IT environment within an enterprise
Defining specific governance strategies and processes to implement in specific situations

question: Which of the following is a guiding principle in the development of COBIT?
options: COBIT aligns with other related and relevant I&T standards, frameworks and regulations
COBIT includes relevant content from other related I&T standards, frameworks and regulations.
COBIT serves as a comprehensive standalone framework that covers all relevant I&T-related activities.

question: Which of the following is an element of governance?
options: Building plans to align with the direction set by the governance body
Monitoring activities designed to achieve enterprise objectives
Evaluating stakeholder needs to determine enterprise objectives

question: In most cases, management of the enterprise is the responsibility of:
options: the project management office.
the executive management team.
the board of directors.

question: Which of the following benefits derived from the use of COBIT is PRIMARILY associated with an external stakeholder?
options: COBIT provides guidance on how to organize and monitor the performance of I&T across the enterprise.
COBIT helps to manage the dependency on the use of external service providers.
COBIT helps to ensure compliance with applicable rules and regulations.

question: The primary target audience for COBIT is:
options: anyone responsible for the governance solution.
assurance professionals responsible for evaluating and reporting on the existence of internal controls.
business and IT management responsible for building and deploying I&T solutions.

question: Within the principles for a governance system, the value generated from the use of I&T reflects:
options: the ratio of costs versus achieved service levels.
a balance among benefits, risk and resources.
maximized financial benefits to the investment portfolio.
